channel.title: Future Events on Tama-Toledo Community Visioning
channel.description: Recent content in Future Events on Tama-Toledo Community Visioning

item.title: Steering Committee Meeting
item.description: Minutes from our last meeting on February 3, 2022, are now available at this link . The original committees from Tama and Toledo, and others who wish to join the effort, are invited to meet and discuss organization, priorities, and next steps. This meeting is tentatively set for STC Elementary to avoid potential conflicts at the Wieting Theatre with STC Individual Speech Parents' Night. Agenda specifics: Follow-up on our February meeting.
